scripts.lint: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v ruff||where ruff',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('ruff check src tests examples',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[python-worker] ruff not available, skipping lint');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.typecheck: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v mypy||where mypy',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('mypy src',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[python-worker] mypy not available, skipping typecheck');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.format: ruff format src tests examples || echo '[python-worker] ruff not available'
scripts.format:check: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('command -v ruff||where ruff',{stdio:'ignore'});execSync('ruff format --check src tests examples',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch{console.log('[python-worker] ruff not available, skipping format check');process.exit(0)}"
scripts.verify:fast: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.verify:full: npm run verify:fast && npm run test
